nodes.documentation:
Smart contract to create and manage an English Auction.
The auction could be in 4 different Phase:
- Glory phase: the good could be bought at its buyout price and
  the auction will not start;
- Submitting phase: anyone (excpet for seller and manager) can submit a bid,
  the bid must be grater than the actual one + the min increment;
- Finilizing phase: the auction is finished, the seller or the winner have to
  confirm the end of it moving to the pending phase;
- Pending phase: the winner has to perform the transfer of the value at which
  the good has been sell (i.e. his bid).

* In some particular case, the manager of the auctions can change the phase or
can interact with the contract to avoid ambiguous situation.
The creation and the destruction of the auction will pass throught the contract manager.
nodes.name: EnglishAuction
LogNewPhase
LogNewHighest
LogEnd
LogPending

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Permission denied, operation out of the correct phase! Check the actual phase"

arguments.value: Permission denied, operation out of the correct phase! Check the actual phase

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Permission denied, operation out of the correct phase! Check the actual phase"

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to check if the function is called in the correct phase

    * @param _phase  phase related to the function.
nodes.name: atPhase

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Provided input amount is different from value sent, try again!"

arguments.value: Provided input amount is different from value sent, try again!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Provided input amount is different from value sent, try again!"

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to check if the amount specified in the input
field is the effective one send to the contract

    * @param amount  amount inserted in the input field.
nodes.name: correctAmount

nodes.documentation: Modifier to change the phase based on block mined.
nodes.name: changePhase

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to avoid that the seller or the manager make a bid
OR buy out the good.
nodes.name: canInteract

nodes.documentation: Modifier to permit only to seller and manager to change phase manually.
nodes.name: canChangePhase

nodes.documentation:
Manually go forward to the next Phase, only seller or manager can change it.
5 block must be mined from the last phase change and the phase cannot be changed
if it is in Filizing or Pending.

    * modifier canChangePhase(): check if the fuction has been called by the seller
OR the manager
nodes.name: nextPhase

nodes.documentation:
Sell the good before the auction start, emit the event to inform
other intrested partecipiants. Then go to the pending phase.

    * @param amount  value transfered to the contract.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.GloryPhase): check if the phase is the right one.

    * modifier canInteract(): check if the caller of the function is not the seller
OR the manager.

    * modifier correctAmount(amount): check if the value sent is equal to the amount
in th einput field.
nodes.name: buyNow

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are the actual winner of the auction!"

arguments.value: You are the actual winner of the auction!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are the actual winner of the auction!"

nodes.documentation:
Submit a bid for the good. Check if the bid is correct and if
the bidder is not the actual winner or the seller or the manager.
Emit an event to declare the new highest bid.

    * @param amount value transfered to the contract.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Submitting): check if the phase is the right one.

    * modifier canInteract(): check if the caller of the function is not the seller
OR the manager.

    * modifier correctAmount(amount): check if the value sent is equal to the amount
in th einput field.
nodes.name: makeBid

nodes.documentation:
Finilize the auction to confirm the end of it and the amount that
the winner have to pay for the good. The amount is freez in the contract
and the payment become pending.
Emit an event to declare the end of the auction.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Finilizing): check if the phase is the right one.
nodes.name: finalize

nodes.documentation:
Extinguish the payment freezed in the finilizing phase.
The winner have 1440 mined block to do it, otherwise the manager
can tranfer the pending amount to the seller, or give back the
amount to the winner (e.g. the seller don't send the good to the winner).
Emit an event to declare the end of pending payment.

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Pending): check if the phase is the right one.
nodes.name: transferPending
incrementPhase

nodes.documentation:
Extinguish the payment freezed in the finilizing phase.
The winner have 1440 mined block to do it, otherwise the manager
can tranfer the pending amount to the seller, or give back the
amount to the winner (e.g. the seller don't send the good to the winner).
Emit an event to declare the end of pending payment.

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Pending): check if the phase is the right one.

params.amount: value transfered to the contract.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.GloryPhase): check if the phase is the right one.     * modifier canInteract(): check if the caller of the function is not the seller OR the manager.     * modifier correctAmount(amount): check if the value sent is equal to the amount in th einput field.

params.buyOut: buy out price of the good;
params.incr: minimum increment from the previous bid;

params.amount: value transfered to the contract.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Submitting): check if the phase is the right one.     * modifier canInteract(): check if the caller of the function is not the seller OR the manager.     * modifier correctAmount(amount): check if the value sent is equal to the amount in th einput field.

buyNow(uint256).notice: Sell the good before the auction start, emit the event to inform other intrested partecipiants. Then go to the pending phase.

methods.constructor: Contract constructor, it can be called from the contract manager and it need the address of the seller and of the manager.

finalize().notice: Finilize the auction to confirm the end of it and the amount that the winner have to pay for the good. The amount is freez in the contract and the payment become pending. Emit an event to declare the end of the auction.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Finilizing): check if the phase is the right one.

makeBid(uint256).notice: Submit a bid for the good. Check if the bid is correct and if the bidder is not the actual winner or the seller or the manager. Emit an event to declare the new highest bid.

nextPhase().notice: Manually go forward to the next Phase, only seller or manager can change it. 5 block must be mined from the last phase change and the phase cannot be changed if it is in Filizing or Pending.     * modifier canChangePhase(): check if the fuction has been called by the seller OR the manager

transferPending().notice: Extinguish the payment freezed in the finilizing phase. The winner have 1440 mined block to do it, otherwise the manager can tranfer the pending amount to the seller, or give back the amount to the winner (e.g. the seller don't send the good to the winner). Emit an event to declare the end of pending payment.     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Pending): check if the phase is the right one.

userdoc.notice: Smart contract to create and manage an English Auction. The auction could be in 4 different Phase: - Glory phase: the good could be bought at its buyout price and  the auction will not start; - Submitting phase: anyone (excpet for seller and manager) can submit a bid,  the bid must be grater than the actual one + the min increment; - Finilizing phase: the auction is finished, the seller or the winner have to  confirm the end of it moving to the pending phase; - Pending phase: the winner has to perform the transfer of the value at which  the good has been sell (i.e. his bid).  * In some particular case, the manager of the auctions can change the phase or can interact with the contract to avoid ambiguous situation. The creation and the destruction of the auction will pass throught the contract manager.
